attributes.action: Say NO to migrants coming into the UK
attributes.additional_details: We have people living on the streets that can't get a home but migrants can, veterans that have given everything and have no home but migrants who have given nothing can get a home, sick and injured that are having treatment stopped because it's costing to much but we can still give money to every other country this needs to stop and it needs to stop now.
attributes.background: Let's help our own people before we go helping out others.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/106477

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
